# Introduction {#intro}

## General information

* Title: TERRA REF, An Open Reference Data Set From High Resolution Genomics, Phenomics, and Imaging Sensors
* Dates of Data Collection: 2017 and 2018
* Geographic Location: Maricopa, Arizona
  * Center of the field: -111.9749 latitude and 33.07549 longitude
  * Field is 200 m by 20 m
* Keywords: Sensor, Phenomics, Sorghum, TERRA-REF
* Funding: The work presented herein was funded in part by the Advanced * Research Projects Agency-Energy (ARPA-E), U.S. Department of Energy, under Award Number DE-AR0000598.

The data pipeline used to process sensor data and generate was described in @burnette2018.

## Data Use, Sharing, and Access

All data is released to the public domain under the CC-0 license. All original software is licensed with the BSD-3 clause or MIT/BSD compatible license. All software used for data processing has been archived on Zenodo and is available on GitHub in the terraref organization.
